package step2;

/********* Begin *********/
//定义站台类，实现卖票的功能。
public class Station  extends Thread  {	 
		
	static int num = 20;
	Object object = "aa";
	@Override
	public void run() {
		while (num > 1) {
			synchronized (object) {
				if(num > 0){
					System.out.println("卖出了第"+num+"张票");
					num--;
				}else{
					System.out.println("票卖完了");
				}
				try {
					Thread.sleep(100);
				} catch (InterruptedException e) {
					// TODO Auto-generated catch block
					e.printStackTrace();
				}
			}
		}
		
	}
}
/********* End *********/
